price: 124. Diggah baababay sin gaboobiiy sin ibitte Argiqeyyo, migdi gabaay guri iba siinik Argiqeemil hinnay guri gabaay migdi iba siinik Argiqeemil, tohuk lakal diggah inkih Tamiirâ laqiibat sin xinkiyeyyooh sin fanniseyyo keenik iyye.
arabic: لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَكُم مِّنۡ خِلَٰفٖ ثُمَّ لَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: la-uqaṭṭiʿanna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilāfin thumma la-uṣallibannakum ajmaʿīna
